column5: I plan on arriving on the Wednesday (have to leave Friday).  Can't wait? Question: Do you guys use FRS radios up there? Do you have a channel you normally use (I usually use 7-24). Looking forward to seeing everyone!
Stop it Roger...Stop it....I'm workin as fast as I can...   Leah and I will be there Monday to Monday 18th to 25th  Back to the shop..
I think I shall make a sticky..it's time to start getting our stuff organized.

Ok...yeah I'm jealous...  My maiden trip to the fine lodge will be in September thanks to the auction for Tyler French.  Can we change the weekend next year by 1 weekend to accomodate me?  Please...pretty please with roe bags on top?  Tony
